display_long_description:
Vostitsa Conclave is a first-person VR narrative adventure that immerses you in the clandestine gatherings that sparked the Greek Revolution of 1821. Blending history with interactive storytelling, the game lets you take the role of Leon Messenézis, a wealthy merchant drawn into the secretive Filiki Eteria.

Engage with iconic figures such as Papaflessas, Andreas Londos, and the Zaimis brothers as you navigate tense councils, uncover hidden messages, and face moral dilemmas. Your choices shape the tone of the story through branching roleplay archetypes,  each reflected in dynamic NPC reactions.

The experience combines narrative dialogues, quiz-style challenges, and tactile VR puzzles that bring historical rituals and secret proceedings to life. 

With full English and Greek support, Vostitsa Conclave offers both an educational journey for younger players and a rich, story-driven experience for cultural explorers. Whether alone or in quiet parallel with others, you will step into the shadows of history, where every word and action could tip the balance toward revolution.
